main event: A civilian man observed a cigar-shaped, silvery object moving slowly over Tacoma, Washington on July 3, 1952.
interesting points: The object was seen disappearing behind clouds,The sighting lasted for approximately 20 minutes,The object was described as having a glow at around 10-15,000 feet,Another report cited a quicker sighting of an unidentified object about 20 miles Southeast of Tacoma,No photograph is present in the document.
witness description: Civilian man and his wife, who is a carpenter
